references.paper_title: SIB-200: A simple, inclusive, and big evaluation dataset for topic classification in 200+ languages and dialects
references.reason: This paper introduces the SIB-200 dataset, which is the foundation upon which the MVL-SIB dataset is built, forming the core of the experimental evaluation in the paper.

references.paper_title: mBLIP: Efficient bootstrapping of multilingual vision-LLMs
references.reason: This paper introduces mBLIP, a multilingual vision-language model that is directly benchmarked in this paper, and the results are used to provide context and comparisons for the MVL-SIB benchmark.

references.paper_title: Centurio: On drivers of multilingual ability of large vision-language model
references.reason: This paper introduces Centurio, another important multilingual vision-language model that is directly compared against in this paper, providing further context and comparisons for the MVL-SIB benchmark.

references.paper_title: IGLUE: A benchmark for transfer learning across modalities, tasks, and languages
references.reason: This paper introduces the IGLUE benchmark, which is used to provide correlation analysis for the proposed MVL-SIB benchmark, showing how the new dataset relates to and complements existing work.

references.paper_title: The state and fate of linguistic diversity and inclusion in the NLP world
references.reason: This paper provides the language tier groupings used in this paper to categorize and analyze the performance of various models across different language resource levels.
